name: ARCoachingOverlayViewDelegate
desc: A set of callbacks you implement to be notified of coaching events.

items.name: func coachingOverlayViewWillActivate(ARCoachingOverlayView)
items.desc: Tells you when the coaching overlay view activates.

items.name: func coachingOverlayViewDidDeactivate(ARCoachingOverlayView)
items.desc: Tells you when the coaching experience is completely deactivated.

items.name: func coachingOverlayViewDidRequestSessionReset(ARCoachingOverlayView)
items.desc: Tells you when the user taps the coaching overlay view's Start Over button while the session is relocalizing.
